name: Binary Tree - Send Tree Pay
description:
The Bad Man(Purple) should take harmful items(like fire) to destroy the tree.

The Good Man(Red) should take recover items(like bandage) to recover the tree.

When the time's up, the Good Man wins if the tree is alive, otherwise the Bad Man wins.

Good Man(Red) Move：W、A、D Use Item：Left SHIFT 

Bad Man Move(Purple)： ↑ 、 ←、 → Use Item：Right SHIFT
